sn38.13:1.6: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada, etesam bhavanam parinnaya”ti?
sn38.13:1.7: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etesam bhavanam parinnaya”ti.
sn38.13:1.8: “Katamo, panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etesam bhavanam parinnaya”ti?
sn38.13:1.9: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etesam bhavanam parinnaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.13:1.11: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etesam bhavanam parinnaya”ti.
sn38.13:1.12: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etesam bhavanam parinnaya.
